refsect1.title: APPLICATIONS
refsect1.para: This section lists the applications included with Amanda. See the individual man pages for instructions on using them. For complete How-To information, consult the Amanda wiki at http://wiki.zmanda.com.

refsect1.title: DEFINING APPLICATIONS
refsect1.para: Application properties, like Amanda configuration parameters, are insensitive to case, and - (dash) and _ (underscore) may be used interchangeably.
See the individual plugin documentation for properties applicable to each plugin.
